verbs.description: Donald Trump 's pick for Secretary of Veterans Affairs , Rear Adm. Ronny Jackson , [V: has] been making headlines for all the wrong reasons . On Wednesday it was reported that Jackson once provided a " large supply " of the opioid painkiller Percocet to a White House military staff member .
